column6: THE WORLD FAMOUS, THRILL-PACKED DISNEY ATTRACTION ROARS TO LIFE AS AN ALL-NEW MARVEL EPIC BURSTING WITH ACTION, ROMANCE, MYSTERY, AND ADVENTURE! The never-before-told saga of how the dangerous gold mine of Big Thunder Mountain became the haunted legend it is today! Malevolent mine owner Barnabas T. Bullion is determined to shelter his teen daughter Abigail from the dangers of life in the Wild West. Abby has other plans...but even she wasn't counting on robbing her own father's train full of gold! Abigail's made her way into the Big Thunder Mountain Mine...but will she make it out? And what is the protective power that dwells deep within the mysterious mountain? Surprises await you in the latest Disney Kingdoms saga by the acclaimed duo of Dennis Hopeless (Spider-Woman) and Tigh Walker (Avengers Undercover)!
column8: | penciller (cover):Pasqual Ferry | writer:Dennis Hopeless | artist:Tigh Walker
